headline: Stock Split Watch: Are These 2 Unstoppable Stocks Next?
summary: There is no science to predicting which companies will resort to a stock split and when, but observers can use some clues to make educated guesses.  Stock splits help make a company's shares look more affordable.  Are stock splits in the works for these corporations?
